Package itec220.labs

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
itec220.labs.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Purpose: Create a parent class for all the pieces that will store general information about the piece that has been created Date: 4/20/2023
Author:
Donovan Horne

  • Method Details

    • setRank

      public void setRank(int rank)
      Set the rank of the current piece, used for moves
      Parameters:
      rank - the new row of the piece

    • setFile

      public void setFile(int file)
      Set the file of the current piece, used for moves
      Parameters:
      file - the new column of the piece

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(int newRank, int newFile, Board board)
      Used to see if the move that is being made is going to put the king in check
      Parameters:
      newRank - the new row of the piece
      newFile - the new column of the piece
      board - a current board state, we create a copy to not make any changes
      Returns:
      Return a boolean of whether the move is valid

    • getValidMoves

      public abstract ArrayList<AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Integer>> getValidMoves(Board copy, boolean kingCheck)
      A method for every piece to determine their valid moves
      Parameters:
      copy - a copy of the current board state
      kingCheck - set to true if you wish to allow the move to be valid without checking to see if it will put the king in check
      Returns:
      Return a list of valid moves for the piece
